files.patch:
@@ -40,0 +40,3 @@
+      xcode-toolset-version:
+        required: false
+        type: string
@@ -150,1 +153,1 @@
-          sudo xcode-select --switch /Applications/Xcode_14.3.1.app/Contents/Developer
+          sudo xcode-select --switch /Applications/Xcode_${{ inputs.xcode-toolset-version }}.app/Contents/Developer
